articles.author: Vatican News
articles.title: Pope Francis at Easter Urbi et Orbi: Christ is risen! All begins anew! - Vatican News - English
articles.description: Following the Easter Sunday Mass, Pope Francis delivers his Easter message and blessing "To the City and the World," praying especially for the Holy Land, Ukraine, Myanmar, Syria, Lebanon, and Africa, as well as for victims of human trafficking, unborn childr…
articles.content:
By Deborah Castellano Lubov
Pope Francis gave his traditional "Urbi et Orbi" Easter message on Sunday, appearing from the central loggia of Saint Peter's Basilica overlooking the Square below where … [+8466 chars]
